overview: Joseph Pistritto brings over 24 years of software development experience to UBmatrix where he oversees development of all UBmatrix software products. Pistritto has held various senior management roles in software engineering including vice president internet products at Oracle and vice president systems engineering at PointCast. Prior to joining Embarcadero Technologies, he was vice president of engineering at XDegrees, which was acquired by Microsoft. Pistritto received his BS and MS degrees in Electrical Engineering from Johns Hopkins University in Baltimore, Maryland.
